game.name: Gathering Platformer
game.description:
A brand new adventurer game has entered our website with a new kind of fun and entertainment. Do you like to get you participated and control a circular hero? Join Gathering Platformer and be prepared to move and jump your character while collecting keys and avoiding different kinds of obstacles and hindrances! Make sure to keep your character alive until you reach the goal. The gameplay is pretty simple, but you are sure to keep you glued to the screen for a long.

Common friends! Get ready to challenge your jumping abilities and do not forget to grab all the stars that you see on the screen in this one of the best HTML5 platform games for boys! Follow the instructions that appear on the screen and guide your control you complete the present level and move to the advanced level! There are 10 unique and challenging levels to play through and filled with awesome fun and entertainment. Follow a particular route that passes through different locations!

Collect all kind of keys and also keep your eyes on picking up the speed when your roll! Pay attention to the details to complete all 10 levels and become a king of the platformer! We know that you might need changes in a search for extra thrill. Browse through our extensive variety of free adventure games that are available to play online without download! All you need to do is arrange a desktop, mobile phone, tablet and iPhone or iPad.
